scripts.dev: npm run build-calendar && npm run build-onboarding
scripts.build: npm run build-calendar-prod && npm run build-onboarding-prod
scripts.build-calendar: cd nova-components/Calendar && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run dev
scripts.build-calendar-prod: cd nova-components/Calendar && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run prod
scripts.build-onboarding: cd nova-components/Onboarding && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run dev
scripts.build-onboarding-prod: cd nova-components/Onboarding && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run prod
